meanings.definition: Relating to or situated at the interface between two substances.
meanings.sent1: The interfacial tension between oil and water can be observed in a simple experiment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the interfacial properties of materials to understand their behavior at boundaries.
meanings.sent3: The interfacial dance between the ingredients in the recipe created a delicious blend of flavors.
meanings.sent4: The interfacial relationship between the characters in the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The interfacial boundary where the two colors meet creates a striking visual effect.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or occurring at an interface.
meanings.sent1: The interfacial region between the land and the sea is rich in biodiversity.
meanings.sent2: An interfacial reaction occurs when the two substances come into contact.
meanings.sent3: The interfacial meeting of the two rival teams led to an unexpected friendship.
meanings.sent4: The interfacial connection between the two devices allowed seamless data transfer.
meanings.sent5: The interfacial boundary where the warm and cold air masses collide can lead to storms.
